title: My Hacktoberfest 2025 Journey
author: Rahul Raj
content: Hacktoberfest 2025 was an incredible open-source experience. I contributed to multiple repositories including a job portal frontend built with React and TypeScript, a competitive programming repo, and a flag guessing game in vanilla JavaScript. I submitted 12 pull requests, with 7 successfully merged!

title: Building My Portfolio with React + Vite + Tailwind
author: Rahul Raj
content: This portfolio is built using React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. It features sections like About, Projects, Experience, Skills, and Blog â€” all with a modern orange-accented UI and smooth animations.

title: How I Improved My DSA Skills
author: Rahul Raj
content: Practicing regularly on platforms like LeetCode and Codeforces helped me strengthen my problem-solving skills. I focused on patterns like sliding window, binary search, and dynamic programming.
